resources.string: Here the user take a look to his Approved and Reviewed Albums. Start Listening: approved Album ready to listen. Give Feedback: Listened Approved Albums ready to review. Feedback Sent: Albums already reviewed by user. Not Active: Albums no more or not yet available for a user review.

First Activity for an already Registered User. Here the user can take a look to the activities he can perform according to his settings and preferences. He can see Suggested Albums (recently added) according to his preferred genres, labels or band. Your Genres: user preferred music genres bring to a list of Albums by this selection. Your Labels: bring the user to a list of albums according to user fav labels. Your Request: Albums selected by the user. All activities give to the user a number of points that are expressed in a user Level (for example Reviewer) and in one or more badges. .

Here the user can take a look to the Albums available according to one of his Favorite Genre. Available for Request: a selection of available albums that user could be interested to request. Listen Now: a selection of albums that are easily Approved by Labels. Most Requested: selection of Albums that many user have requested. No More Available: albums that are not more available for Request due to release date or other time restrictions. Each Tab include also a number of Albums available and a link to see them all

Here the user can take a look to the Albums available according to one of his Favorite Label. Available for Request: a selection of available albums that user could be interested to request. Most Requested: selection of Albums that many user have requested. No More Available: albums that are not more available for Request due to release date or other time restrictions. Each Tab include also a number of Albums available and a link to see them all.
From here user can login into the App. That could requires the use of Social Networks Authentication API and an user Database to verify users credentials

First Activity after first Social Login. Here all user informations and account settings can be edited and stored. Go to Settings: is suggested as next activities if user logged with Socials. Go to Dashboard: is suggested as next activities if user logged with mail.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc sem nisi, tempus eu lacinia facilisis, laoreet ut lorem. Curabitur nulla est, tincidunt ac quam quis, tincidunt aliquam dui. Proin ut dui massa.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc sem nisi, tempus eu lacinia facilisis, laoreet ut lorem. Curabitur nulla est, tincidunt ac quam quis, tincidunt aliquam dui. Proin ut dui massa.

This Activity present the Pre-Release album information. When the user select an album this is where he arrives. Cd cover, title, band, Label and genre/s, as well as Release date and description are basic detail. A button to Request it complete the Activity. The Requested Album will be enlisted in Dashboard and Rack activities. When approved by Label, User can listen tracks in a new Activity.
What appeals to you about this Album? (Select all that apply.)
I keep hearing about this Album!

In this Activity, the user can select what appeals to him about the selected Album. When Request is sent, the Album is added to Dashboard (Your Request Tab). When approved the Album will be added to Your Albums Rack (Start Listening Tab). Approvation confirmation will be delivered by e-mail to the user
Are you interested in connecting with this Band (interviews, events, etc)?
Would you purchase this Album for yourself or a friend?
Share a private note about the Album with the Label (but contact support for any file issues you are experiencing). Add your review in the section below.
Your review may be featured on this Album\'s MusicReviewer page! (Having trouble opening a file? Contact support instead.)
If you posted your review online, please add the link (or links) here.
Here the user can take a look to his old Review and opinions. He can Edit,share and see his review.
Your opinions mean a lot. Thanks for sending.
Saved! Share your review with your friends!
